Reviews.Content: Reasonable with a few comments Room larger than average for Tokyo.Bed extremely comfortable (too bad jet lag is so severe in Japan).Elevators and facilities work.No gym.Breakfast is the worst I have ever eaten. I thought I was on candid camera. Perhaps left over from a Japanese prison.The English language skills of the staff do not exist. Not one single word. Narry an English sign. Lots of guess work.Nice area to run in.All all in all not bad.
Reviews.Author: allan1949
